Comments_List: Through class discussion, the great feedback on papers and meeting with Dr. Della Rocca during his office hours, I was challenged to grow as a philosopher and writer. By the end of the semester, I know that I was more careful and more nuanced in my writing as a result of this class.

The topic selection was terrific but I wish that we could have covered Descartes' mind/body dualism at some point for one of the class discussions, especially since this seems to be one of Descartes greatest contributions to philosophy and is still widely discussed today.
Yes, I would. I learned a lot about Descartes through this course. The reading selection, class discussion, and professor were all excellent.
